Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.tui.print

Class AsyncHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.tui.print.AsyncHandler
public class AsyncHandler extends Object
Provides a shared queue and executor service for asynchronous printing tasks.

  • Field Summary

    Field
    Description
    private static final ExecutorService
    executorService
    The executor service for managing asynchronous tasks.

    executeAsync(Runnable task)
    Submits a Runnable task for execution by the executor service.

    shutdown()
    Shuts down the executor service gracefully, waiting up to 30 seconds for tasks to complete.

      private static final ExecutorService executorService
      The executor service for managing asynchronous tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • AsyncHandler

      public AsyncHandler()

  • Method Details

    • executeAsync

      public static void executeAsync(Runnable task)
      Submits a Runnable task for execution by the executor service. This method is used to perform tasks asynchronously using the threads managed by the executor service.
      Parameters:
      task - The Runnable task to be executed asynchronously.

    • shutdown

      public static void shutdown()
      Shuts down the executor service gracefully, waiting up to 30 seconds for tasks to complete.
